caption: A man in white is throwing a javelin in the arena.
A weightlifting man in a black dress who lifts a weight above his head.
Two teams of women wearing red and blue clothes are playing basketball.
A female soccer player in a red dress and a player in a purple dress are running towards the ball.
Some women have boarded the cable car.
Two wrestlers in blue and red clothes wrestle each other.
A group of men from the football team are standing together in white and blue clothes.
The lady in a black dress is on a white horse and is shooting with a bow.
A group of cyclists riding down a steep road.
Six female rowers are rowing in a boat.
Two boxers with blue and red hats are boxing together.
The women's sitting volleyball match is held between two teams wearing white and yellow uniforms.
A male athlete is ready to throw the discus at the competition venue.
The taekwondo player in red clothes has jumped in the air to kick.
A man in a green sports suit is throwing a javelin.
Two basketball girls in red clothes and one girl in white clothes are trying to catch the ball.
